title: 3bd 1.5ba house in Allendale neighborhood
posting_body: Located in the desirable Allendale neighborhood, this spacious 3 bedroom 1.5 bathroom bungalow is filled with old-world charm, natural light, and characteristic built ins.
It has new paint and new wood laminate flooring.
* Large living/family room and a separate dining room.
* Kitchen with tile floor, granite counter top and plenty of cabinet space.
* Central heat, and dual pane windows.
* Pre-installed curtain rods are ready for tenants' window covering.
* Onsite laundry room.
* Gated front yard, and shared backyard.
* 1 designated parking space in the back of the house.
Plenty of street parking.
* Convenient location, close to 580, bus stops, BART, and walking distance to Laurel district shopping area.
LEASE TERMS:
Rent: $2595, Security deposit $2700.
1 year lease minimum.
Additional $100 per month for all utilities (PG&E, water and garbage).
Requirement: Good rental history, stable income and no evictions.
Minimum credit score 625.
Gross income 2.5 x rent (combined income for all applicants).
No Smoking.
Small pets (less than 15lb) negotiable for additional pet deposit and pet rent.
Documents needed to apply: 1. completed rental application for each adult.
2. copy of driver license.
3. proof of income for last 30 days.
4. $30 for credit check for anyone living in the property 18 years or older.
Available: 7/25/2022.
If the ad is up, it is still available.
